body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting us. My name is Jeremy Collins and I'm a customer service representative at CleanStay Hotels. May I know your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello Jeremy, my name is Kathleen Garcia.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great to meet you, Kathleen. Could you please provide me with your email address?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my email address is kathleen.garcia@example.com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Kathleen. And may I also have your phone number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, my phone number is five five five, nine eight seven, two three four one.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for sharing that information, Kathleen. We value your feedback. Is there anything specific you'd like to discuss today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, I recently stayed at one of your hotels and was impressed by the cleanliness. I wanted to express my appreciation.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm glad to hear that, Kathleen. We strive to ensure a comfortable stay for all our guests. Thank you for taking the time to share your positive experience with us.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: If you have any further feedback or need assistance in the future, please don't hesitate to reach out. Thank you for your time today, Kathleen. Have a wonderful day!
